ul.li:
people – balach
a boy, bodach

a man, fear
a man, gille
a boy, saor
a carpenter, a joiner

children

a father, màthair
a mother

a cow, breac
a trout, cat
a cat, caora
a sheep, cù
a dog, each
a horse, eun
a bird, fiadh
a deer, iasg
a fish, iolair

a field, allt
a stream, a burn, aodann

a town, bata

a mountain, bruthach

coal, làmh

a stick, monadh
a moor, muir
a sea, mullach
a summit, a top, nead
a nest, sgillinn

a seed, seed(s), sloc
a pit, a hollow, sràid

a nose, sùil
an eye

a table, cathair
